Examples

Example 1: Calculate values of a additional column


<div id="calculate_example1" swa="Calculate FROM ../data/visualisation/calculate/uicurve_ohnep.json"></div>
        

window['calculate_example1_options'] = {
    calculations: [
        {
            formular: "u * i",  // Any JS formular
            target: "p"         // Name of the target attribute
        }
    ]
};

Calculates the P column.

Example 2: Calculate sum from a list of sources

Calculates the sum of attributes from sources. This example uses the sumonly template to show only the sum.
Note: The sources must be available under http://localhost


<div id="calculate_example2" swa="Calculate FROM ../../data/visualisation/calculate/fromsources.json TEMPLATE sumonly"></div>
        

window['calculate_example2_options'] = {
    sourceattr: 'source', // Name of the attribute that contains an URL to the datasets
    calculations: [
        {
            formular: "voltage * current",
            target: "yield"
        }
    ]
};
The datasource used. Contains URLs to datasets. 

{
    "list": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "title": "String 1"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "title": "Modul 1-1-1",
